description: This file defines a Kotlin class 'SettingsFragment' that extends Fragment. It serves as a UI component for a settings screen, inflating a layout resource and providing a factory method for instantiation.

classes.name: SettingsFragment
classes.description: A fragment representing the settings screen, inflating the 'fragment_settings' layout and providing a static factory method.

methods.name: onCreateView
methods.description: Overrides Fragment's onCreateView to inflate the settings layout.

methods.name: newInstance
methods.description: Factory method to create a new instance of SettingsFragment.
